title: A pavement shall mean any Municipal/Govt
clause_text: A pavement shall mean any Municipal/Govt. /Semi-Govt. pavement, and shall include any viable stretch of the pavement as may be considered viable for the purpose of SRS.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, and Structure of hut:

source_pdf.text_snippet: A pavement shall mean any Municipal/Govt. /Semi-Govt. pavement, and shall include any viable stretch of the pavement as may be considered viable for the purpose of SRS.
